name: Taito Memories II Joukan
summary:
Taito Memories Joukan was released in 2005 for the Japanese PS2 and contains 25 of Taito's arcade games from the 80s and early 90s:
- Ah Eikou No Koshien
- Alpine Ski
- Bubble Bobble
- Cameltry
- Cleopatra Fortune
- Darius Gaiden
- Don Doko Don
- Elevator Action Returns
- Flipull
- Grid Seeker
- Jigoku Meguri
- Kiki Kaikai
- Kuri Kinton
- Light Bringer
- Lunar Rescue
- Majestic Twelve: The Space Invaders Part IV
- Metal Black
- Puchi Carat
- PuLiRuLa
- Rastan Saga
- Runark
- Space Invaders Color
- Space Invaders DX
- Syvalion
- The Fairyland Story
